column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Yesterday , I woke up and realized how gorgeous of a day it was so I decided to eat my breakfast and then go outside for a nice bike ride with some friends at the park .
#text=When I went into the garage to grab my bicycle I noticed that the tire had gone flat and I would need to repair it if I wanted to go for a ride with my friends .
#text=I called my friend Joey up and asked if he could give me a half hour to replace the tire .
#text=Joey said that was fine so I went and got some tools and a spare tire to replace the flat one with .
#text=I took the old tire off and tightly put the new one on .
#text=To make sure that everything was in place I took it for a test ride around the block before calling my friend Joey back and letting him know that I was now ready for a ride .
#text=After that I went on the bike ride and everything went perfectly .
